H0.text: In the books by the Rev. W. V. Awdry and the UK TV series first broadcast in 1984 with Ringo Starr as storyteller, how many wheels does Thomas the Tank Engine have. 4

H1.text: In the books by the Rev. W. V. Awdry and the UK TV series first broadcast in 1984 with Ringo Starr as storyteller, how many wheels does Thomas the Tank Engine have. 8

H2.text: In the books by the Rev. W. V. Awdry and the UK TV series first broadcast in 1984 with Ringo Starr as storyteller, how many wheels does Thomas the Tank Engine have. 10

H3.text: In the books by the Rev. W. V. Awdry and the UK TV series first broadcast in 1984 with Ringo Starr as storyteller, how many wheels does Thomas the Tank Engine have. 6

A4.text: Thomas was described in the opening to 'Thomas and Gordon', the first story in the book Thomas the Tank Engine (1946), as a 'fussy' and 'cheeky' tank engine with 'six small wheels, a short stumpy funnel, a short stumpy boiler and a short stumpy dome'.
